string-array.name: player_bio
string-array.item: Donnarumma is a goalkeeper who joined PSG from AC Milan in 2019. He is a product of the Milan youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2015. He has represented Italy at youth level and made his senior debut in 2016.

Hakimi is a right-back who joined PSG from Real Madrid in 2021. He is a product of the Real Madrid youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2017. He has represented Morocco at youth level and made his senior debut in 2018.

Kimpembe is a centre-back who joined PSG from Monaco in 2017. He is a product of the Monaco youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2015. He has represented France at youth level and made his senior debut in 2016.

Ramos is a centre-back who joined PSG from Real Madrid in 2021. He is a product of the Real Madrid youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2005. He has represented Spain at youth level and made his senior debut in 2005.

Marquinhos is a centre-back who joined PSG from AS Roma in 2018. He is a product of the Roma youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2013. He has represented Brazil at youth level and made his senior debut in 2013.

Verratti is a central midfielder who joined PSG from Juventus in 2018. He is a product of the Pescara youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2012. He has represented Italy at youth level and made his senior debut in 2012.

Ruiz is a central midfielder who joined PSG from Napoli in 2019. He is a product of the Real Madrid youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2015. He has represented Spain at youth level and made his senior debut in 2015.

Vitinha is a central midfielder who joined PSG from Sporting CP in 2021. He is a product of the Sporting CP youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2019. He has represented Portugal at youth level and made his senior debut in 2019.

Mbappe is a forward who joined PSG from Monaco in 2020. He is a product of the Monaco youth academy and made his first-team debut in 2017. He has represented France at youth level and made his senior debut in 2017.
Neymar is a forward who joined PSG from FC Barcelona in 2017. He is a product of the Santos FC. He has represented Brazil at youth level and made his senior debut in 2010.

Messi is a forward who joined PSG from FC Barcelona in 2021. He is a product of the FC Barcelona Academy and made his first-team debut in 2004. It’s hard to find the words to describe a man that the football world knows simply as ‘The GOAT’.
